channel.title: On a rail cart bug [Fixed]
channel.description:
[code]setpos -1931.053955 2663.294678 996.866516;setang 35.541161 148.833649 0.000000
hostname: Half-Life 2 version : 1.0.1.0/14 4104 insecure map : bm_c2a2a at: -1931 x, 2663 y, 996 z players : 1 (1 max)[/code]
There is platform : [img]https://cloud.steampowered.com/ugc/900975196034500420/7CF05B51BD99DEE4536A1E30FAFA3566EACAE5BB/[/img] If i press S button(slow down cart speed) platform continues move but cart stays on the same place: [img]https://cloud.steampowered.com/ugc/900975196034541038/22325C356BB45894420B6AB506E3F268C9043DE4/[/img]
